title: Whataburger shares fans' Halloween costumes
text:

These days decided to go as Whataburger order numbers. Image 10 of 62 Members of the San Antonio Express-News staff took the time to rank all of the options on the Whataburger menu. Here are the Top 50 items, which include sandwiches, breakfast, side items, desserrts and more. Scroll through the slideshow to see what item landed at No. 1.

Photo: Courtesy Photo/Whataburger 1. Double Meat Whataburger Image 62 of 62 Whataburger shares fans' Halloween costumes 1 / 62 Back to Gallery This week Whataburger shared photos of the way some customers express their love for the burger chain during the Halloween season.
These photos were sent to the chain via social media by fans of the brand.
RELATED: Epic couples costumes for Halloween
For those that haven’t decided what they want to be for Halloween, these photos could serve as inspiration. We’ve yet to see someone adequately pull of a sexy #4 with extra bacon and large onion rings costume, so there's that.
Big Halloween costume trends this year include zombies, Donald Trump, Minions, the pizza rat, and Super Mario Brothers among other current pop-culture hallmarks.
